Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

pinsManifest 0.0.0.9000

  • Added public-facing functions (#1):

    • pin_write_manifest(): given a board_folder() write a manifest file (pins.txt) of its pins and versions, in its root directory.

    • board_url_manifest(): given a URL (for a site with a manifest), returns a pins::board_url().

    • url_demo_manifest(): returns URL for demonstration board with a manifest.

    • manifest_latest(): given a url, returns a named character vector of pin-URLs that can be used to build a pins::board_url().

  • Added internal functions (#2).

  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.

Developed by Ian Lyttle.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.6.
